title: Introducing: Wake! Owl
content: Wild Country, the debut single from Vancouver based singer/songwriter Wake! Owl is a valiantly composed affair. The popular folk influences, such as Bon Iver and My Morning Jacket are blatant but not over-empowering, with Colyn Cameron’s tender vocals being a particular highlight. Lyrically, it’s smile inducing and poetic, but not earth-shatteringly moving, however it more than fulfills its modest intentions. With his debut EP released soon, it’ll be extremely interesting to see where Wake! Owl takes his sound from here, as he clearly posses a valuable songwriting ability. Check out the serotonin rush that is Wild Country below, and head over to the Wake! Owl bandcamp for a free download of the track.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
